programme.desc: Katin Houser and the Pirates (4-4, 2-2 American) host the Owls (2-6, 0-4). Houser, a sophomore, tossed a career-high five touchdown passes in a 56-34 victory over Temple last week. Florida Atlantic junior CJ Campbell Jr. owns eight rushing TDs.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Darcy returns to her hometown for Christmas, and she reconnects with Luke, a former rival, they must plan a charity event together. As she spends time with her family and Luke, she starts to realize what matters most in life.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: A man and an old high school friend try to sell his uncle's business -- a Mexican bakery that's famous for magical gingerbread cookies that grant wishes.

programme.title: The Christmas House 2: Deck Those Halls
programme.desc: Excited for a calm Christmas, Mike Mitchell unexpectedly gets roped into a Christmas house-decorating reality TV show against his brother.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: Julia Crawley and Ryan Mason must unite their families during Crestridge's Centennial Christmas celebration to save their family inns from a chain resort.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: When young siblings receive a magic pen from Santa that appears to be granting wishes, they request a Christmas gift they want more than anything -- for their separated parents to reunite.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: An executive examines her company's new property and prepares a presentation to transform the rustic lodge into a new hot spot. She tries to ignore the lodge's festive celebrations during her stay, but an unexpected romance changes her heart.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rich man falls back in love with Christmas and a party planner.

programme.title: Mystic Christmas
programme.desc: A woman reconnects with the owner of a pizza shop while working at a rehabilitation center and aquarium during the holidays.

programme.title: Inventing the Christmas Prince
programme.desc: Shelby is about to quit her job as a rocket engineer when her daughter becomes convinced that her Scrooge-like boss is a Christmas prince from a story.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of a Victorian festival, Cassie invites movie star and former high school classmate Jake to play Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: Reporter Kendra Adams searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring with the help of the grandson of the ring's owner.

programme.title: Road to Christmas
programme.desc: Los Angeles television producer Maggie Baker unwittingly falls for Danny Wise, the son and former producer of his mother's popular annual Christmas special.

programme.title: Our Christmas Journey
programme.desc: As a single mom and her teenage son come to a crossroad during Christmas, she must learn to let go so he can flourish as she finds her own heart healing in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Every Time a Bell Rings
programme.desc: Three reunited sisters discover their late father planned one last scavenger hunt -- an annual holiday tradition when they were young. As their sisterly bond gets rekindled, they soon learn important lessons about what they want in life and in love.

programme.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Carly heads to a quaint town to lead the church choir during Christmastime. As she gets to know an Army veteran and the townspeople, she stumbles across clues that suggest she may have been brought there for a life-changing reason.

programme.title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
programme.desc: Sophie Bennett, the owner of the Holly Lodge, tries to convince a developer that the lodge is actually a bad investment.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom Jacobs has built a business around helping clients find the perfect gift for their loved ones. When he's hired to find a gift for his friend's girlfriend, he finds himself in a bit of trouble: The more he researches her, the more he likes her.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her mother's house, she finds out that for the past few years her aging mother had been hiring professionals to decorate it for Christmas. Noelle tells the decorator that the deal is off, but he refuses to take no for an answer.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: When the office assignments are distributed for Secret Santa, Melanie is excited that she was given her crush, Donovan. Donovan is so taken by the thoughtful gifts and notes, he starts to fall in love. But someone else is stealing Melanie's credit.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and works with her brother's friend to build a house for a friend in town.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: Run it Back
programme.desc: Michelle Beadle, Chandler Parsons and Lou Williams discuss the biggest NBA games, matchups & storylines from around the league.

programme.desc: A fast-paced coverage with live "look-ins" of game action, guiding fans through all the buzzer-beaters, game-winners and top moments of the night.

programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Moto GP Malaysia: Trka
programme.desc: Pratite Veliku nagradu Malezije, uzbudljivo takmičenje koje će dovesti najbrže vozače na međunarodnu stazu Sepang.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Bayern - Zalgiris
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal: LŠ Azije - ELITE: Pohang Steelers - Shandong
programme.desc: 40 najboljih klubova Azije se obračunava za prestižni pehar. Da li će pobediti neko iz zemalja izlazećeg sunca ili neko od bogatih arapskih klubova?
